channel.title: Connection problem
channel.description: hi, i can't seem to figure out why other people can't connect to my server. i can connect to my server, but no one else can. i have a no-ip that works. iv'e port forwarded and that works, but i can't figure why i cant get it plz help.. w4rf4c3 :D

item.title: Connection problem
item.dc:creator: @w4rf4c3 w4rf4c3
item.description:
@w4rf4c3 wrote:

static ip?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 10:20:23 pm[/size][hr]is there anyone out there that know’s what a static ip is, or know what i need to do to have people to connect to my server? it would help alot thanks. :eek:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 11:47:01 pm[/size][hr]comon, nobody in all of moparscape can help me out?
